Chapter 2191 - Chapter 2191: Rao Yaoyao, Goodbye! (2)

Chapter 2191: Rao Yaoyao, Goodbye! (2)

Translator: Nyoi-Bo Studio Editor: Nyoi-Bo Studio

Just as she had this thought, Elder Yu shouted aloud.

The Saint Language reverberated in all directions. It was powerful and clear as it entered the ears of all the trial-takers in the Yunlun Mountain Range.

“Rao Yaoyao?”

“It’s Sword Deity Rao! Sword Deity Rao is back!”

“The war in Sky City had ended? Weren’t there four demi-saints who passed by just now? How could they have been dealt with by Fairy Rao so quickly?”

“Impressive! As expected of the Number One Sword Maiden; as expected of the Seven Sword Deity!”

“You’re wrong. Judging from the sword cry just now, Sword Deity Rao must have made a breakthrough. Perhaps I should call her Sword Saint Rao now!”

Everyone looked forward to Rao Yaoyao’s dazzling debut in the arena and her perfect comeback to counter the final-stage disaster brought by Sky City.

But there was none.

Rao Yaoyao was silent and did not respond to Elder Yu. After she underwent sanctification, she had become very low-key.

At this moment, after the mournful sword cry, the sky suddenly cracked, and the Sword Will that filled the sky shot out.

“Sword again?”

“There’s still a sword saint?”

“No way. Who could it be? There’s a second sword saint in Sky City? Let me count…”

“That’s not right. That’s impossible. There had been no news about the Seven

Sword Deity. Who else had gone to Sky City other than Fairy Rao?”

“Eighth Sword Deity?”

With a loud explosion, the sky within a radius of tens of thousands of miles in the Yunlun Mountain Range shattered like a mirror.

The Sword Will that filled the sky crisscrossed and outlined a magnificent sword diagram. It was ancient, distant, and powerful.

It was clear that the force this time was even better than before!

“This sword diagram…”

At this moment, the trial-takers on the Yunlun Mountain Range felt that something was amiss

Why did it seem like it was a poor bandit who was on the run with the enemy on its tail?

But on second thought, this was too ridiculous!

The Seven Sword Deity, Rao Yaoyao, who had undergone sanctification, had become a ‘poor bandit’?

This wasn’t funny!

“Way of the Sword, Power Upanishad Formation…”

On Pixiu Mountain, Su Qianqian, who held a fierce black broadsword in her arms, stared dazedly at the sky, her face filled with shock.

“Little junior sister, you must have seen wrongly. This is clearly…” Gu Qingsan was also stunned. As he spoke, he gulped.

“Third Senior Brother, if it was not that, then what was it?”

“I didn’t say it wasn’t…” Gu Qingsan trembled. “This is clearly, it is clearly!”

The conversation between the two ancient swordsmen spread from one to ten, ten to a hundred, and in an instant, everyone in the Xu Faction on the peak of Pixiu Mountain knew about it.

Even Jiang Xian, who wanted to leave the Imperial City Trial but was caught by the Xu Faction and locked in a cage, knew that this was the power of the Upanishad.

However, so what if it was the power of the Upanishad?

You ants have never seen a real demi-saint fight!

Jiang Xian was trapped in a cage and was filled with humiliation. However, he thought in his heart, “If my clan’s demi-saint Jiang Buyi were to attack, he would be able to turn his palm into clouds and his palm into rain. With just a finger, he would be able to crush this so-called Way of the Sword Power Upanishad Formation.”

“Way of the Sword Upanishad, second realm… That’s not good!”

Unlike this ignorant Jiang, Elder Yu had seen the Way of the Sword Power Upanishad Formation before.

An ancient swordsman’s power of the Upanishad was vastly different from that of a Spiritual Cultivator.

If it appeared with an array diagram, it must be the second realm of a certain sword technique.

It seemed that someone really wanted to hunt down Rao Yaoyao?

But…

How was that possible?

How could anyone dare!

The turmoil in his heart had yet to completely dissipate, but when the Power of Upanishad Formation in the Nine Heavens was released, a voice that was neither sad nor happy, floated down.

“Swordsmanship is famous. It’s called heart…”

“The Dao of the heart is godless, faithless and lawless!”

Heart Sword Technique?

Elder Yu’s pupils dilated. He turned around and wrapped Yu Zhiwen in his Holy Power and sent her back.

“Leave the battlefield first!”

“Grandpa Yu…”

Yu Zhiwen was anxious. She stretched out her hand and wanted to resist, but she could not resist the Holy Power.

She still had something to say.

This voice sounded high and mighty to everyone, like a God.

However, Yu Zhiwen felt that it sounded extremely familiar. It was clearly Xu Xiaoshou’s voice. Even though the voice was disguised and sounded cold and aloof, Yu Zhiwen could recognize it immediately.

Xu Xiaoshou pursued Rao Yaoyao?

There is something strange about this. I have to be present. Perhaps I can…

“Buzz! ”

By the time the Nine Heavens Way of the Sword Power Upanishad Formation lit up, Yu Zhiwen had already been teleported to the edge of the Yunlun Mountain Range.

She gritted her teeth, and the heavenly star light on her body surged. She stepped out, and the starlight followed her as she stepped into the battlefield.

Falling red flowers danced in the air, and the fragrance of plum blossoms wafted over.

As soon as she entered, outside Abyss Island, under the map of the sword, a bit of intangible remnant thought was forced out along with the red plum blossoms.

Rao Yaoyao had nowhere to hide!

She knew that she was the focus of everyone’s attention at the moment. She was naturally embarrassed and angry and did not dare to make a sound.

However, Xu Xiaoshou didn’t even give her a chance. He chased after her and wanted to kill her.

How could he!

How did he manage to master the second realm of the Heart Sword Technique?

At this moment, no matter how humiliated or angry she was, Rao Yaoyao had no choice but to shout out with all her might under everyone’s gaze.

“Elder Yu, save me!!!”

She had to shout for help.

If she didn’t shout for help, then the Singer of the Stars and Moon’s sacrifice would have been in vain.

If she didn’t shout, she would really lose her life. With her life at stake, Rao Yaoyao cast aside her pride and had tears in her eyes.

Perhaps such setbacks could forge a stronger self…

Just as Rao Yaoyao had expected, this shout caused the entire Yunlun Mountain Range to break out in an uproar.

“What?”

“Rao Yaoyao is shouting for help?”

“Oh my God, she didn’t retreat after she accomplished her task. Instead, she returned empty-handed and was chased out?”

“That’s impossible. That’s the Seven Sword Deity. How powerful must the person who chased after her be…”

“The Heart Sword Technique? I remember that the second realm of the Heart Sword Technique is associated with the Seven Sword Deity Mei Siren.. But his voice could not be that young?”
